mapper.select: SELECT c.member_id, c.goods_id, c.quantity, c.price AS total_price, it.name AS item_name, it.open_status AS item_open_status, it.market_id, m.name AS market_name, m.open_status AS market_open_status, g.price AS item_price, g.remain_quantity, g.shipping_fee, i.image_src FROM cart c FULL OUTER JOIN item it ON c.goods_id = it.item_id FULL OUTER JOIN market m ON it.market_id = m.market_id FULL OUTER JOIN goods g ON it.item_id = g.item_id FULL OUTER JOIN image i ON i.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND INSTR(i.image_src, it.item_id || '-1') > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (member_id, goods_id, quantity, price) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{cartItem.goods.item.id}, #{cartItem.quantity}, #{cartItem.price})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND goods_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS id, order_date AS orderDate, total_price AS totalPrice, tracking_number AS trackingNumber, order_status AS orderStatus FROM orders WHERE tracking_number = #{trackingNumber}

SELECT o.order_id, order_date, total_price, used_point, card_company, card_number, og.goods_id, og.quantity, it.name AS item_name, it.open_status AS item_open_status, it.market_id, g.price AS item_price, g.shipping_fee, m.name AS market_name, m.open_status AS market_open_status, i.image_src, sm.member_id AS seller_id, sm.name AS seller_name, sm.address AS seller_address, sm.phone AS seller_phone, bm.member_id AS buyer_id, bm.name AS buyer_name, bm.address AS buyer_address, bm.address_detail AS buyer_address_detail, bm.zip AS buyer_zip, bm.phone AS buyer_phone FROM orders o FULL OUTER JOIN order_goods og o.order_id = og.order_id FULL OUTER JOIN item it og.goods_id = it.item_id FULL OUTER JOIN goods g og.goods_id = g.item_id FULL OUTER JOIN market m o.seller_id = m.member_id FULL OUTER JOIN image i o.seller_id = i.member_id FULL OUTER JOIN member sm o.seller_id = sm.member_id FULL OUTER JOIN member bm o.buyer_id = bm.member_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} AND INSTR(i.image_src, it.item_id + '_1') > 0
mapper.insert: SELECT order_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO orders (order_id, order_date, total_price, used_point, card_company, card_number, expiry_date, buyer_id, seller_id) VALUES (#{id}, SYSDATE, #{totalPrice}, #{usedPoint}, #{cardCompany}, #{cardNumber}, #{expiryDate}, #{buyer_id}, (SELECT member_id FROM item JOIN market USING (market_id) WHERE item_id = #{goodsList[0].item.id}))
